Name: Garowe
Description: Garowe (Somali: Garoowe, Arabic: غاروي‎) is the administrative capital of the autonomous Puntland region in northeastern Somalia.

Name: Bosaso
Description: Bosaso is the economic capital of Puntland, northern Somalia.

Name: Mogadishu
Description: Mogadishu (Somali: Muqdisho; Arabic: مقديشو‎ Maqadīshū) is the capital of Somalia, a major battleground of the civil war which has ravaged the country since 1991.

Name: Kismayo
Description: Kismayo (also Kismaayo, Kismayo, Kismayu and Chisimayu) is a port city in Southern Somalia.

Name: Hargeisa
Description: Hargeisa is the capital of the self-proclaimed republic of Somaliland. In recent years, it has been one of the safest places in what the rest of the world still officially considers to be Somalia.

Name: Berbera
Description: Berbera is a large city in the autonomous region of Somaliland. Popular golden beaches such as Bathaale and Batalaale have earned the city the nickname beach city.

Name: Las Anod
Description: Las Anod (Arabic: لاسعنود‎) is the capital of Khatumo.
